clinical_history: Patient presents with abdominal discomfort and bloating.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates mildly heterogeneous without fluid collection.
Placenta is normal and normally located.
Thyroid gland shows homogeneous echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Left kidney shows mildly thickened, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Testes are coarse with normal vascularity.
Right kidney demonstrates isoechoic, no hydronephrosis.
Uterus appears mildly thickened; endometrial thickness measures 25.15 mm.
